section.title: Feedback and support
section.para: Feedback regarding this program is more then welcome. Please report any problems you find, or send your ideas to improve the usability to: support@sql-workbench.net
If you want to contact other users of &wb-productname; you can do this using an online forum at Google Groups: http://groups.google.com/group/sql-workbench

section.title: JLine
section.para: &wb-productname; includes the JLine library to support command line editing for the console mode on Unix style operating systems. The JDK on Windows supports full editing of the commandline including the usual Windows hotkeys to show the list of commands, so JLine is not used when &wb-productname; is running under Windows.
